0x00000008.description: Link Partner Coefficient Update request received.
0x00000008.name: EthLtKrLpCoef

0x00000010.description: Local Device Coefficient Update request to send.
0x00000010.name: EthLtKrLdCoef

0x00000014.description: Local Device Status Report to send.
0x00000014.name: EthLtKrLdStat

0x00000020.description: Select PRBS11 polynomial and define seed to use for transmitted training pattern.
0x00000020.name: EthLtKrTrainingPattern

0x00000024.description: Configure receive training pattern checker function.
0x00000024.name: EthLtKrRxPattern

0x00000028.description: Counter for PRBS11 errors detected by receive pattern checker function.
0x00000028.name: EthLtKrRxPatternErr

0x0000002c.description: Holds first 16 bits from the training pattern of received training frames.
0x0000002c.name: EthLtKrRxPatternBegin

fields.description: Set to 1 to enable the Base-R startup protocol. Should be set to 0 to disable the Base-R startup protocol.
fields.name: EthTrainingEnable

fields.description: Self-Clearing bit, should be set to 1 to restart the Base-R startup protocol. This register should always be written with RestartTraining bit set to 1.
fields.name: EthRestartTraining

fields.description: 16bit Coefficient Update Request to send to link partner.
fields.name: EthCoeffUpdate

fields.description: 16bit Status report field to send to the link partner.
fields.name: EthStatusReport

fields.description: 16bit coefficient update information received from link partner.
fields.name: EthCoeffUpdate

fields.description: 16bit Status report received from link partner.
fields.name: EthStatusReport

fields.description: If set 1 the checker ignores the first data of the training pattern to allow loading the prbs register from the incoming data. If set 0 the seed value is used and check begins at the first bit.
fields.name: EthIgnoreFirstData

fields.description: Select which PRBS11 polynomial should be used.
fields.name: EthPrbsSelect

fields.description: Seed value to load into PRBS11 checker register at begin of every training frame.
fields.name: EthSeed

fields.description: Holds the first 16 bits from the training pattern of received training frames. Bit 15 holds the first bit received.
fields.name: EthPatternBegin

fields.description: Counter for PRBS11 errors found in received training frames by the receive pattern checker. Counter saturates at 0xffff and clears on read.
fields.name: EthErrors

fields.description: When 1 indicates training process is complete (signal detect is now propagating to the PCS allowig it to establish a link).
fields.name: EthSignalDetection

fields.description: When 1 indicates that Training failure has been detected.
fields.name: EthTrainingFailure

fields.description: When 0 indicates that the startup protocol is completed. When 1 indicates that the startup protocol is in progress.
fields.name: EthStatus

fields.description: When 1 indicates that Training Frame delineation is detected.
fields.name: EthFrameLock

fields.description: When set 0, indicates that the receiver training is proceeding. When written with 1 by the application, indicates that the receiver is trained and is ready to receive data.
fields.name: EthReceiverStatus

fields.description: Select which PRBS11 polynomial should be used for the training pattern within transmitted training frames.
fields.name: EthPrbsSelect

fields.description: Seed value to load into PRBS11 at begin of training pattern.
fields.name: EthSeed
